parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command

</title><part><name>game1</name>=<value>  arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value>  Returns the right color of given row.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[lnbColorRight]] [idc, [row, column]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - Index of the row

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - Index of the column

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - RGBA

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbColorRight]] [row, column]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - Index of the row

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - Index of the column

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - RGBA

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_color= _control [[lnbColorRight]] [0, 0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbSetColor]] [[lnbSetColorRight]] [[lnbColor]]

</value></part></template></root>
